storyInfo: Just as Yato and Noir Corne change their equipment, the old hunter arrives at the campsite. He recalls his past and has a confrontation with the gang. Suddenly, the Palico appears, followed by...

attributes.content: Your hatred for dried blood will cause your spearhead to rust and go dull.
Tonight will be the same as that night. There will be but a single moon in the lake.
The reflection of the moonlight, weak and powerless, always hiding in the back... If only things had gone in a different direction...
Ah... It's too quiet.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: The calmest nights are always the cruelest, for that is when those who should not have been forgotten are dragged to the surface of our memories.
You must remember... I told you this before. We often rested at the campsite by the lake, sat around the campfire, and discussed how to deal with the beasts.
The crackling, the turning barbecue, the melting fat. I remember.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: I... I will never forget any of it.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: It's time. Let's not keep the beast waiting any longer.
Hm? A fire from that direction...
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: The abandoned camp?!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Who could be there?
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Someone cooked here...
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: This fire...
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: The Terran night sky looks just about the same as ours... but the stars apurr to be in completely different pawsitions.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Mrow... So meowny strange clouds covering the sky tonight, like nothing I've ever seen. I should note this down.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: From what Noir Corne has told me, Terra's climate is not meowch different from ours.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Wind, thunderstorms, rain, and snow... Similar environments have similar natural cycles. Nothing strange about that.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: But he also mentioned a phenomeownon called... Catastrophes? What could be so cat-astrophic to deserve a name like that?
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: If his description is accurate, then they're as terrifying and destructive as the Amatsu turning out, only caused by this Originium they seem so obsessed with...
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: How could rocks pawssibly be the cause of anything when they can't even move? I can't make heads or tails of how this works.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Not that I'm one to acknowledge a phenomeownon I've never observed myself, but... it seems nearly everything unique about Terra has to do with Originium.
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Oh... If only I could see a Catastrophe with meow own eyes...
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Mrow? Is Noir Corne back?
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Huh? Who's that...?
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.text: The fire illuminates the elderly man's face.
The ravines, though eroded away by the past...
seem far more ancient than everything he's been through.
He cannot remember how long ago it was.
The campfire before him feels just as hot as it did then.
Time once burnt away rouses once again those muddled voices.
He cannot tell if it is he or the earth which is shaking...

attributes.content: Akira...
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Akira.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Hah, you're not dead yet, old timer.
attributes.name: Akira Kashiwau

attributes.content: Indeed, not yet.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Unlike you, these fierce but dull-witted beasts will never defeat me.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Life is stubborn, huh? That's what you think? Just like those beasts who keep crawling forward even with their skulls pierced?
attributes.name: Akira Kashiwau

attributes.content: Not bad. You think that's what you've become.
attributes.name: Akira Kashiwau

attributes.content: Listen up. I will keep hunting.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: It doesn't matter if there are a hundred, a thousand, or even ten thousand of those beasts in the forest. I won't stop until they're all dead.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: It doesn't matter what I am up against... One by one, I will kill each and every one of them with my own two hands.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: I have to hunt the big one now. I have no time to deal with you or your word games.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: *cough*—Scratch marks, and huge ones, too.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: It must've been here not too long ago... It's hungry, and it's on the hunt.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: You don't stand a chance tonight.
attributes.name: Akira Kashiwau

attributes.content: Preposterous.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: You're old and battered, and you've just been through a brutal struggle. Plus, it's raining, and there's no one to help you here.
attributes.name: Akira Kashiwau

attributes.content: If you keep going like this, you will die. You're no wild beast. You know that.
attributes.name: Akira Kashiwau

attributes.content: I'm not like you... I won't go down so easily.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: You know who you are.
attributes.name: Akira Kashiwau

attributes.content: ...Look at these fallen leaves. If I cover these marks with them, no one will know they weren't washed here by the rain.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: No one else will find its tracks. This hunt is mine and mine alone.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Really, old timer, sometimes I don't get what the point of all this is.
attributes.name: Akira Kashiwau

attributes.content: So now you're going to criticize me?
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: All I did was take your place and do what you would.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Really now?
attributes.name: Akira Kashiwau

attributes.content: Chasing beasts into the forest like it's the end of the world... hacking and slashing at them, carving out their hearts, and coming home covered in cuts and bruises...
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: You used to blabber about hunting day in and day out. Isn't that what you loved the most?
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Even after all this time, you still don't understand me.
attributes.name: Akira Kashiwau

attributes.content: Oh? I don't understand you? Then what about you? Do you think you all your actions were correct?
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: You've never once listened to what I say. Have you ever tried to understand how I feel? Even once?
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: That night, if you had listened to even a single word I said...
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: If you hadn't charged into this damnable forest, you wouldn't have turned into an unrecognizable pile of minced meat.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: And I would never have left you behind like those guys did.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Do you still not understand? Everything that I do... I'm doing it for you.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: No, Yoshitaka, you're doing it for yourself.
attributes.name: Akira Kashiwau

attributes.content: And you know it.
attributes.name: Akira Kashiwau

attributes.content: He can't hear your voice.
attributes.name: Akira Kashiwau

attributes.content: We meet again, Kashiwau.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: So that was you...
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: I warned you not to enter the forest.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: We're free to come and go as we please. We have no reason to be intimidated by you.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: You stubborn kids don't know what's good for you... You don't know what real fear is!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: You will die! Do you get it? Die!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Maybe. But more importantly, nothing can scare us off from completing our mission.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: And may I ask you to set down what you're holding?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: This is my hunting equipment... Mine, you thieves!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Feel free to take what's yours, but please put down the things that belong to us.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: You won't need them, and that's because you're leaving this forest right this instant! Don't even think about getting in my way!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Preposterous.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Alright, I see now... You're just here to make trouble for me, aren't you? You want to take everything from me, don't you? Just like them.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: You're overthinking this. I'm only worried about your safety.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: You see, Kashiwau, you came here too. Which means we share the same objective.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I don't understand why you feel the way you do, and naturally I don't need to know either.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: But I have a suggestion. Let's set aside our differences and work together. We can solve a lot of problems that way.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Not a chance! That quarry is mine and nobody else's!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: In that case, I ask only that you not interfere with our work anymore.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Furthermore, considering we have the same objective, your actions will likely affect us one way or another...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: So I suggest you wait at the camp until daybreak. You're free to return to the village after that.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Yato, that's a bit...
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: You... How dare you!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Begone! Crawl back to wherever you came from!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: I refuse.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Hold on, you two.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: I... I'll have the lot of you...
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: I see it!
attributes.name: Felyne Artisan

attributes.content: Smithy, what do you see?
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: Hunters! You need to leave this place and put out that campfire immediately!
That voice... You're...!
attributes.name: Felyne Scholar

attributes.content: The firelight has attracted the Rathalos's attention. It'll come attacking any second now!
The Rathalos?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Rathalos!
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau
